creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Circular bronze mirror with long undecorated handle. Back of mirror decorated with figures of two Nambans (Portuguese?) in low relief. Both figures wear ruffs and trousers, and carry fans (?). Inscription to the left of the smaller figure. (Mirror  is accompanied by a modern wooden stand).
title: Mirror with Nanban figures
